xuiDatetimePicker
directive in module xui

Description

XUI component for date and time selection.

Usage

as element:
<xui-datetime-picker
       ng-model="{date}"
       [caption="{string}"]
       [name="{string}"]
       [is-required="{boolean}"]
       [is-disabled="{boolean}"]
       min-date="{date}"
       max-date="{date}">
</xui-datetime-picker>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
ngModeldate

ng-model is supported to provide underlying data for this component.

caption
(optional)
string

Label of this component.

name
(optional)
string

Name to be used for form level validation.

is-required
(optional)
boolean

Make this component fail if the value is not fully specified (date and time have to be filled in).

is-disabled
(optional)
boolean

Whether this component is enabled or not.

min-datedate

Limit minimal available date.

max-datedate

Limit maximum available date.

Example
